Package Q3

Class XDate

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Date
      • Q3.XDate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<java.util.Date>
    class XDate
extends java.util.Date
    The class XDate wraps the deprecated java.util.Date class.
    Since:
    4-15-2020
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Amit Bashan
